articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence  Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju gave field guidance to the Terminal of the Pyongyang International Airport which was successfully completed.
					 He commanded a bird's-eye view of the terminal from his plane.
					
					 Saying that the Pyongyang International Airport was well built in a neat way, he set forth the tasks for completely renewing its area in harmony with the modernly-built terminal.
					
					 He stressed that the vicinity of the airport, including the areas of Sunan District and Thaekam Farm, should be renovated as befitting the gateway to the capital city of Pyongyang, under the Party's general plan for development of the airport area, and high-speed railway and motorway from the airport to the central city should be built to ensure the traffic in a smooth way.
					
					 After getting down through a corridor-style boarding bridge of the terminal, he went round the newly-built terminal.
					
					 He was very satisfied to see the terminal well built in harmony with modern aesthetic taste and national character.
					
					 He noted with pleasure that the gatepost of the airport was erected in such way as to sustain the national character and the front and back of the terminal are very nice.
					
					 Going round departure waiting lounge, departure procedure hall, arrival procedure hall, arrival entrance hall, service hall, a room for special guests and other places of the terminal, he learned in detail about their construction and preparations for their operation.
					
					 Recalling that leader Kim Jong Il instructed to build well the Pyongyang International Airport several times till the last moments of his life, Kim Jong Un said this instruction was implemented at last. I feel deep remorse at the failure to show Kim Jong Il this wonderful terminal, he said, adding:
					
					 The leader would have been very glad to hear that the airport was built wonderfully like this by our own efforts. His smiling image is vivid before my eyes.
					
					 Kim Jong Un gave his thanks on behalf of the Party Central Committee to the soldier-builders, officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions and working people who built the terminal as a model edifice in the Songun era to be proud of before the world.
					
					 Stressing the need to ensure the management and operation of the terminal in a good manner, he specified the tasks and ways for having a splendid ceremony for its inauguration on July 1 and starting the aviation service.
					
					 He ardently called for building many edifices symbolic of the thriving and highly-civilized country by whipping up the creative zeal for the Korean speed exerted in the construction of the terminal and thus significantly adorning the venue of the grand October festival.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yo Jong and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Croatia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Croatia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Kolinda Grabar Kitarovic, president of Croatia, on its national day.
					 The message wished the president and people of Croatia successes in their work for the development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Mozambique
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Mozambique
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Filipe Nwussi, president of Mozambique, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wished the president bigger success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of Slovenia
articles.content:
Greetings to Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister of Slovenia
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Thursday sent a message of greeting to Karl Erjavec, deputy prime minister who doubles as foreign minister of Slovenia, on its national day.
					 The message wished the people of Slovenia prosperity and happiness.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets President of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of a DPRK government delegation on a visit to Equatorial Guinea, had a talk with Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, at the presidential palace on Tuesday.
					 The president said he couldn't forget President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people, recalling their unsparing support to his people and him.
					
					 He said that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un was emerging victorious in the just struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country despite the imperialists' moves for stifling it and their interference and challenges.
					
					 He noted it was the invariable stand of the Equatorial Guinean government to boost the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations which have steadily developed in all fields for over four decades.
					
					 He expressed his will to boost the bilateral economic cooperation in the interests of the peoples of the two countries in the spirit of south-south cooperation.

articles.title: Congratulations to New Chairman of C.C. of People's Party of Cambodia
articles.content:
Congratulations to New Chairman of C.C. of People's Party of Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Hun Sen upon his election as chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia at the 38th plenary meeting of its 5th Central Committee.
					 The message noted his election represented the deep trust and expectation of the Party Central Committee and all its members for him.
					
					 It wished him greater success in his responsible work to consolidate the party and achieve the development of the country and national unity, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK NDC Statement Blasts U.S. War Moves
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Statement Blasts U.S. War Moves 
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued a statement Thursday, 65 years since the U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression on this land.
					 Many generations have replaced by others and the era has also changed but fragile state of ceasefire which is neither war nor peace persists on the Korean peninsula, the statement said, adding the U.S. imperialists' war moves have become serious by the minute.
					
					 Far back in the 1950s when the Cold War started, the U.S. launched the war with an intention to wipe out the DPRK after setting it as target "A" in the secret "War Plan A,B,C" and then to stretch the tentacles of aggression to the vast areas of China and the former Soviet Union, targets "B" and "C".
					
					 The U.S. ambition still lingers on the Korean peninsula as a ghost of aggression and war.
					
					 This is reflected in the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, war acts pursuant to it and strategic move for laying a siege to the Asian continent.
					
					 The U.S. design to politically isolate and stifle the DPRK has reached extremity pursuant to the strategy.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from the defeat in the war in the 1950s, the U.S. has intensified isolation, blockade and suffocation of the DPRK in a bid to ignite the second Korean war. As the U.S. imperialists' moves have reached a serious phase that can no longer be overlooked, the NDC of the DPRK said as follows:
					
					1. We state to the world that the army and people of the DPRK will launch a nationwide anti-U.S. struggle on a new higher stage to foil the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK and their unprecedented moves to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 June 25 indicts the U.S. imperialists for their ferocity, cruelty and barbarity and makes the army and people of the DPRK to give vent to the pent-up wrath and hatred.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. imperialists are working with bloodshot eyes to make the past crime-woven history repeat itself by igniting another war, far from apologizing with their knees bent for their thrice-cursed crimes.
					
					 The U.S. is bracing for a nuclear war and even a modern germ warfare to exterminate the Korean people.
					
					 The new stage of the anti-U.S. struggle will lead to a just confrontation for ending the long history of the DPRK-U.S. stand-off for the victory of the DPRK.
					
					 2. The U.S. should, though belatedly, repeal its hostile policy toward the DPRK that can never come true, and raise a white flag before history and the Korean people.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are not what they used to be in the past when they had no state, being under the jackboots of outsiders as they had not enough rifles and swords.
					
					 The U.S. had better face up to the reality and stop running amuck.
					
					 It would be the best policy for it to immediately repeal its desperate hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It has to withdraw the war scenario targeting the DPRK and stop the reckless nuclear war racket which it has kicked up on the land and in the sea and air.
					
					 The U.S. had better look back with a cool head what its hostile policy toward the DPRK has entailed.
					
					 It should pay heed to the warning of the DPRK that it is ready for a conventional war, nuclear war and cyber warfare.
					
					 The only way for the U.S. to take is to make apology before the army and people of the DPRK and hoist a white flag.
					
					 3. We appeal to the world to turn out in the worldwide anti-U.S. struggle to dismember the gangster U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. is the most shameless chieftain of aggression and war and ill-famed architect of provocation and destruction.
					
					 It is not time to get afraid of the U.S. bluffing, blindly add voice to the U.S. unreasonable and brigandish sophism and dance to the tune of the U.S. acts of destruction and disturbance.
					
					 It is still not time to take to flunkeyism and submit to the U.S. to echo whatever it says.
					
					 Whoever truly hopes for global peace and regional stability has to set right at an early date the dangerous situation on this planet plagued with bloodshed, disputes and upheavals by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Asia should turn out to cut off the U.S. right hand, Africa should rise up to cut off the U.S. left land, the Mid-east has to cut off the U.S. ankles and Europe has to cut off the U.S. neck.
					
					 The whole world has to pool efforts to dismember the fatty monster U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. is just like a paper tiger easy to be crushed and set on fire.
					
					Whoever truly wishes for durable peace in the world, welfare of humankind and lasting security of posterity has to turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle in high spirits.
					
					 The DPRK will invariably stand in the van of the worldwide just struggle against the U.S. to build a peaceful world and defend genuine life of humankind.

articles.title: CPRK Assails S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
CPRK Assails S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group set up at last a "UN office for human rights performance in the north", an anti-DPRK plot-breeding tool, in Seoul on Tuesday despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK and the strong opposition of people at home and abroad.
					 In this regard, the puppet authorities and rowdy elements of south Korea now say about "historic landmark", "useful aid and cooperation" and the like and the conservative group including the "Saenuri Party" is attempting to pass the "bill on human rights in the north" staying at the "National Assembly".
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces have shown "welcome" to it, revealing their intention to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Wednesday issued a statement branding this as the most hideous political provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The CPRK, in the name of the entire Korean nation, bitterly condemns the establishment of the plot-breeding tool by the south Korean puppet group under the wire-pulling of the U.S. as a blatant challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK and an open declaration of war against it.
					
					 All Koreans ardently wish for earlier improved north-south relations, hailing the statement of the DPRK government issued on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. At this time the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea staged a foul confrontation racket in total ignorance of the DPRK's magnanimity and sincerity as well as of the fellow countrymen's expectation and desire. This is a never-to-be-condoned treachery.
					
					 As for the "UN office for human rights performance in the north", it is an illegal, plot-breeding tool the U.S. and its followers invented by abusing the name of the UN in an aim to stifle the DPRK, frightened at the invincible might of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 That is why various circles of south Korea have strongly opposed the establishment of the "office" intended to incite confrontation of social systems, spoil the north-south relations and invite a war, branding the "office" as an "anti-north plot-breeding body in the guise of the UN" and a "deceive human rights tool for interference".
					
					 Many countries and Western media, too, have strongly rejected the UN's "report on human rights in the north", "resolution on north Korean human rights performance" and "office for human rights performance in the north" as deceptive since they were prompted by extreme prejudice and insidious political aims without any creditability.
					
					 The DPRK had already warned that the "office" would become a target of merciless strike from the moment it puts up nameplate.
					
					 It is no longer need to deal anything with those keen only on hysteric confrontation racket and what remains to be done is only the final showdown. This is the fixed will of all servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group will have to entirely take the blame for all the ensuing catastrophic consequences in the north-south relations from this moment.

articles.title: European External Action Service Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
European External Action Service Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the European External Action Service headed by Gerhard Sabathil, director for Northeast Asia and Pacific, left here Wednesday.
					 During its stay the delegation paid a courtesy call on an official concerned of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and had the 14th directorial-level DPRK-EU political dialogue. Exchanged there were views on the issue of the bilateral relations, the situation on the Korean peninsula and human rights issue and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Officials concerned of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Supreme Court, the Supreme Public Prosecutors Office and the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the chairman of the DPRK-EU Friendship Parliamentary Group had conversations with the delegation.
					
					 The delegation visited the Masikryong Ski Resort, the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage and EU aid objects.
					
					 The delegation's visit to the DPRK will contribute to promoting the mutual understanding between the DPRK and the EU and developing the bilateral relations.

articles.title: Mongolian Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Mongolian Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of the Department for the Diplomatic Corps Service of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia led by Director Otgonbayar Zayamandakh visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the President's old home, members of the delegation looked round historic relics, hearing stories about the time-honored house.
					
					 The delegation visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph and International Friendship Exhibition House and watched a performance given by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Marks Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Marks Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism 
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Thursday, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon and other senior officials of the party and state, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of institutions, industrial establishments and cooperative farms, working people, youth and students in the city and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Among those present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, made a speech at the rally.
					
					 He said: The U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK in order to dominate the whole world with the Korean peninsula as stepping-stone. They committed monstrous crimes unprecedented in human history of wars with huge aggression troops armed with the latest war hardware.
					
					 However, they could never bring to submission the army and people of the DPRK who turned out as one in the war to defend the country.
					
					 They have gone frantic with the moves for a new war while occupying south Korea and persistently pursued a hostile policy towards the DPRK, far from drawing a due lesson from the ignominious defeat they suffered in the Korean war.
					
					 The speaker called upon all people to achieve the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. which was launched on a new high stage, reunify the country and accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The floor was taken by representatives of workers, agricultural workers and youth. 
					
					 They declared that if the U.S. imperialists ignite another war of aggression, the service personnel and people will never miss the opportunity but wipe out the aggressors to the last one.
					
					 Then followed an anti-U.S. demonstration.
					
					 Similar rallies took place in every province, city and county on the same day.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Meet to Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Meet to Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
						
 Sinchon, June 25 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) held a meeting to condemn the bestial atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors and class enemies during the Korean War and vow to take revenge on them in Sinchon, South Hwanghae Province on Thursday, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					 Present at the meeting were officers of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, service personnel of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces of the KPA and students of revolutionary schools.
					
					 Ju Sang Won, an honorary curator of the Sinchon Museum, who narrowly survived at the powder depot in Pamnamu Village, exposed the atrocities perpetrated by U.S. aggressors and class enemies.
					
					 The revenge-seekers in Sinchon are saying that they are shaking with rage, hearing the mere words of U.S. imperialists, and looking forward to the moment to take a thousand-fold revenge on them. They ardently asked the service personnel to blow up the den of cannibals from across ocean in order not to allow the tragedy in Sinchon to repeat itself again.
					
					 Speakers including service personnel and cadets of Kim Il Sung University of Politics renewed their resolution to wipe out the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemies, and their stooges to the last one with their unshakable revolutionary faith and thus force them to pay a thousand-fold dearer price for the blood shed by those in Sinchon. 
					
					 In the poem "Fight for final revenge is at hand", sergeants expressed the will of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to take a thousand-fold revenge on the U.S. aggressors and reduce to ashes the U.S. mainland, den of evils. 
					
					 Then followed the reciting of a poem pledging revenge. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting they went round the Sinchon Museum.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Support Korean People's Cause
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Support Korean People's Cause 
 Nampho, June 25 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen in support of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea at Nampho Port on Thursday. 
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the mosaic depicting the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in Nampho City and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The meeting was attended by captains and crewmen of the Antigua and Barbuda-flagged ship Alert and the Panama-flagged ship Fengan. 
					
					 Speakers said the Korean nation has suffered the pain resulting from division for the past seven decades and the danger of war has always hung over on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 Fair and reasonable proposals for reunification including the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo have not been materialized owing to the moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces, they said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK is firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country, holding aloft the banner of Songun under the present international situation. They expressed the will to stand by the Korean people in the future, too. 
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Another Atrocity Committed by U.S. Unearthed in Sinchon
articles.content:
Another Atrocity Committed by U.S. Unearthed in Sinchon
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Sinchon County in South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK is a witness to the brutal atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the Korean War (1950-1953).
					 At the powder house in Pamnamu-gol (chestnut valley), Wonam-ri of this county alone, the U.S. imperialists massacred 400 mothers and their 102 children.
					
					 In May this year, remains of 51 civilians slaughtered by the U.S. imperialists were unearthed near the powder house, fueling the deep-rooted anti-American feelings of the Korean people.
					
					 Among those remains are a parietal bone stuck with rusty hoe blade, a skull with a brick in its jaws, crushed skulls and broken bones as well as silver ring, mirror, bottle of camellia hair oil, buttons and pieces of bowls. 
					
					 The remains were buried in a pit of seven square meters, according to an official concerned.
					
					 Ri Myong Song, an official of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, when interviewed by KCNA in front of graves of 400 mothers and 102 children, said:
					
					 Though 62 years have passed since the cease-fire, the remains make us keenly feel that the U.S. imperialists are a herd of brutes, the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 We will never forget the barbarity committed by the U.S. imperialist cannibals and force them to pay for the blood shed by the Korean people at any cost.

articles.title: Inshore Fishing Output Increases
articles.content:
Inshore Fishing Output Increases
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Fishing stations in South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK increase the fish catch through active inshore fishing.
					 Unryul, Sohae and Kumsan fishermen's cooperatives doubled inshore fishing output as of June 20 this year as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 They have operated all fishing boats on a normal basis and introduced effectual methods in inshore and underwater fishing, overfulfilling their monthly quotas ahead of schedule.
					
					 The DPRK has paid big efforts to the development of fishing industry, raising it as an important policy to undertake pelagic and inshore fishing on a large scale.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Minju Joson 
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- 65 years have passed since the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War. 
					 The fierce three-year Korean War ceased after the U.S. signed the Armistice Agreement, which is like a surrender document, with their knees bent before the army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should have rolled back their hostile policy toward the DPRK, drawing a due lesson from their defeat and disgrace in the Korean War in the 1950s. 
					
					 However, since the ceasefire the U.S. imperialists have persisted in their hostile policy to realize their ambition for world domination. 
					
					 What is ridiculous is the fact that they, the arch criminal who has ceaselessly escalated the tension on the Korean peninsula, are shamelessly trying to pass the buck for it to the DPRK. 
					
					 No matter how noisily they vociferate about "story of threat from north Korea", they can never cover up their true colors as war provoker and aggressor. 
					
					 As already proved by realities, the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK will only precipitate its destruction. Several decades of DPRK-U.S. standoff proved that the DPRK is sure to emerge a victor while the U.S. is bound to sustain setbacks. This is because the U.S. made a serious mistake in shaping its Korea policy. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly face up to the trend of the times, behave itself and roll back at once its reckless policy of confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Papers Call for Preserving Peace and Precipitate Independent Reunification under Uplifted Banner of Songun
articles.content:
Papers Call for Preserving Peace and Precipitate Independent Reunification under Uplifted Banner of Songun
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Today marks 65 years since the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					 The DPRK papers Thursday dedicate editorials to this day.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the army and people of the DPRK fully displayed matchless pluck and popular heroism in the three year-long fierce Fatherland Liberation War, honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country and gains of the revolution.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The historic victory in the war was a shining one of the Juche-oriented military idea, outstanding strategy and tactics and war method of President Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious iron-willed commander, and the fruition of the indomitable mental power displayed by the army and the people of the DPRK in their heroic fight, rallied close around the party and the leader.
					
					 Through the war, the army and the people of the DPRK powerfully demonstrated before the world that the people guided by the great leader could defeat any formidable enemy and nothing could bring to its knees the people who displayed the indomitable mental power out of their trust and love for everything of their own.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities have become ever more undisguised in their criminal moves to ignite another war on the Korean peninsula and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The situation remains acute and tense and hurdles lie in the way of independent reunification but the country's reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, is sure to be achieved.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on the service personnel and people to single-mindedly unite around supreme leader Kim Jong Un and intensify the struggle for protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation and achieving national reunification under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Opening of "UN Human Rights Office" in Seoul
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Opening of "UN Human Rights Office" in Seoul
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The hostile forces including the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces set up the "UN office for human rights performance" in Seoul.
					 This shows that they have reached an extremely provocative phase in their moves to stamp out the ideology and social system in the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights issue".
					
					 The "office" is an illegal organization which the south Korean puppet forces and their followers cooked up in order to do harm to a sovereign state in wanton violation of the UN Charter and international law, being pursuant to the U.S. scenario.
					
					 We have warned more than once that the opening of the "office" would be an unpardonable anti-DPRKcriminal act of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and in the region and inciting confrontation.
					
					However, the setting up of this ghost-like "office" is a hideous politically-motivated provocation blatantly challenging the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile forces claim the opening of the "office" is pursuant to the "resolution" of the UN Human Rights Council but they can never hide their conspiratorial nature.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces seek to make south Korea a base of breeding plots over "human rights" and internationalize the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket with the "office" as a centre. They organized the UN "seminar on human rights in the north" and "seminar attended by defectors from the north" in New York as part of arrangements for the opening of the "office" and made a string of nonsense against the DPRK in a bid to do harm to its inviolable sovereignty and dignified social system.
					
					 The "office" is nothing but a tool for executing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and a plot-breeding center collecting misinformation fabricated by the riff-raffs for money. It, therefore, regards anti-DPRK activities as a means for its existence.
					
					 Anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is the only mission of the "office". 
					
					 The puppet forces allowed the establishment of the "office" which is rejected by other countries, a clear indication that their inveterate repugnance against the ideology and social system of the fellow countrymen and deep-seated ambition for escalating confrontation have reached the extremity.
					
					 It is a pipe dream for the U.S. and the puppet forces to try to bring down the DPRK by such despicable means and methods as the opening of the "office".
					
					 The opening of the "office" has touched off towering indignation of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile forces will be forced to pay a dear price for setting up the "office".

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Accuse Japan of Denying Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Accuse Japan of Denying Its Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Society of Bereaved Families of the Pacific War Victims and other civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference on June 22 to accuse the Japanese government of denying its past crimes, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 Speakers at the press conference said the Japanese government is justifying Asia invasion by the Japanese imperialists and insulting those countries which fell victim to it. 
					
					 They demanded the Japanese government make an apology to the war victims and pay reparation to them as early as possible. 
					
					 They declared that the members of the above-said society would go to Japan to continue protest activities.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Abrogating South Korea-Japan "Agreement"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Abrogating South Korea-Japan "Agreement"
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 22 calling for abrogating the humiliating agreement covering up Japan's past aggression, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. They included the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 The organizations said in a press release that the south Korea-Japan "agreement" signed by the Park Chung-Hee regime in 1965 was to hide Japan's crimes.
					
					 Under the pretext of the "agreement", the Japanese government denied the atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists including sexual slavery and conscription, shunned the settlement of issues and has persistently distorted history.
					
					 They urged the government of Japan to admit its past aggression and illegality of its colonial rule and abrogate the "agreement".
					
					 The south Korean chief executive should not forget that the humiliating agreement signed by Paek Chung-Hee gave the Japanese government a pretext to evade the liquidation of its crimes, they warned.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 18.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the immortal exploits performed by the President and his sacred revolutionary career and great feats performed by him in the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and hold political and cultural events in the period between June 18 and July 17.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Venezuela, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Venezuela, Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in Venezuela and Indonesia on June 10 and 17 to mark the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A Venezuelan political party figure said that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea, making great contribution to seeing to it that the popular masses discharge their mission as the master of their destiny.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il published "Socialism Is a Science" and other famous works, scientifically proving the truth and validity of socialism. 
					
					 To learn from the experience made by the DPRK in socialist constriction is very important for Venezuela, he added.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia and other speakers said that the WPK came to shed its rays as the party of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They said that the final victory is in store for the Korean people thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia and the Communist Party of the Soviet Union on June 15 and 17 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said in a report that under his wise leadership the DPRK achieved great successes in all fields despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it. 
					
					 She noted that he turned the DPRK into a country unfazed by any storm on the principle of self-reliance in the revolution and construction.
					
					 His personality as great man will be kept forever in our hearts as he was possessed of boundless devotion, warm love for the people, humble trait and ardent patriotism, she said.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK friendly relations will grow stronger.
					
					 Shashbiashbili, vice-chairman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 V. Tyulkin, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers Party of Russia under the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, noted that it is the greatest happiness of the Korean people to be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation, adding that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the idea of preceding leaders on believing in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Bodies, Institutions
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Bodies, Institutions
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Bodies and institutions of different countries posted articles on their websites on June 15, the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo said that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is the historic one of special significance in the movement for Korea's reunification
					
					 It noted that the joint declaration is a fruition brought by patriotism of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, who devoted all his life to the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany noted that to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification is the lifetime mission of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said that all the Korean people will turn out as one in the nationwide movement for Korea's reunification and glorify this year as a year of a great turn to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un who is opening up a new phase of national reunification with his broad magnanimity and generosity.
					
					 A Finnish information agency said it is quite possible to implement the north-south joint declaration if the south Korean authorities maintain their independent stand as the DPRK is doing, and if the U.S. does not lay hurdles in the way of reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Poland
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Poland
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Polish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was formed in Sandomierz City on June 19.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize a seminar, meeting, film show and other colorful events between June 6 and 10 on the anniversaries.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Bulgarian Figure
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Bulgarian Figure
						
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on June 12 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 North -South Joint Declaration.
					 He said that the adoption of the joint declaration was a very great event which provided a cornerstone for the improved north-south relations and the reunification of the Korean peninsula and opened up a new era of reunification.
					
					 He noted: The north and the south of Korea agreed to settle the issue of national reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation. It's because the Korean nation is responsible for the reunification.
					
					 The reunification of the Korean peninsula can never be achieved as long as there is foreign interference.
					
					 There took place good undertakings between the north and the south after the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					 But the north-south relations are getting very serious due to the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad disturbing reconciliation and cooperation on the Korean peninsula and its reunification.
					
					 The way of improving the relations between the north and the south of Korea and reunifying it lies in implementing the joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Bulletin of German Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Bulletin of German Body
						
  Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" was carried by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its special bulletin on June 19.
					 The work, published in February, Juche 91 (2002), deals with the birth and essence of nationalism and the past view on it and important issues arising in achieving independent development of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre terminal de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre terminal de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio junto con Ri Sol Ju la terminal del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang construida magnificamente. 
					El Mariscal tomando el avion particular contemplo desde arriba el panorama de la terminal.
					
					Dijo que se construyo limpio y ordenadamente el aeropuerto, y presento la tarea de renovar radicalmente la zona del aeropuerto dado que la terminal se acondiciono modernamente.
					
					Ordeno reconstruir y arreglar magnificamente como puerta de la capital la fisonomia de los alrededores de aeropuerto incluyendo las zonas del municipio de Sun-an y la granja de Thaek-am segun el proyecto de plan general del partido para el desarrollo de zona del aeropuerto internacional de Pyongyang y construir nuevamente el ferrocarril de alta velocidad y la autopista desde el aeropuerto hasta el municipio central de la ciudad de Pyongyang para que en el futuro el aeropuerto asegure con satisfaccion el transporte como estacion aereo internacional.
					
					El Mariscal se apeo por la pasarela telescopica de la terminal de aeropuerto y paso revista al edificio de la terminal nuevamente construida.
					
					Expreso gran satisfaccion contemplando el edificio construido bien en armonia con el sentido estetico contemporaneo y el caracter nacional.
					
					Se alegro mucho diciendo que la jamba del aeropuerto se construyo bien dando destaque a la nacionalidad y que se realizo exitosamente la obra de la parte frontal y la lateral de la terminal.
					
					Encontrandose en varios puntos incluyendo los halles de espera, servicio y la sala de VIP, estudio detalladamente el estado de construccion y de preparacion para actividades de servicio.
					
					Al fin, se llevo a feliz termino la instruccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il dada en varias ocasiones hasta el ultimo momento de su vida para acondicionar bien el aeropuerto, acoto y prosiguio que le remuerde la conciencia de no haber visitado junto con el Dirigente esta terminal construida magnificamente. Anadio que tambien el Dirigente se alegraria mucho al saber que se construyo maravillosamente la terminal con nuestras fuerzas y que le viene ante su vision la imagen sonriente del Dirigente.
					
					Dio el agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del PTC a los constructores militares, los funcionarios de los comites, ministerios y organos centrales y los trabajadores quienes construyeron la terminal como creacion ejemplar de la epoca de Songun digna de enorgullecerse al mundo.
					
					Es importante llevar bien la administracion y el servicio ya que se culmino con exito la construccion de la terminal, destaco y presento las tareas y remedios detallados de organizar solemnemente el dia primero de julio el acto inaugural y comenzar el servicio.
					
					Exhorto a coronar brillantemente las festividades de octubre al construir muchas edificaciones que demuestren el aspecto de la patria prospera y civilizada con el fervor de creacion de  la velocidad de Corea manifestada en la edificacion de la terminal.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Jae Il, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yo Jong y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Mozambique
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Mozambique
						
　Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Mozambique, Filipe Nwussi, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais africano.
					　El remitente expresa conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se amplien y se desarrollen ininterrumpidamente y le desea al destinatario mayores exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: CDN condena intento de EE.UU. de provocar segunda guerra coreana
articles.content:
CDN condena intento de EE.UU. de provocar segunda guerra coreana 
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario del estallido de la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953) desatada por los imperialistas norteamericanos, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 25 una declaracion. 
					Aunque cambiaron las generaciones y la naturaleza, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la situacion inestable que no es la guerra ni la paz debido a la escalada de acciones de guerra de los imperialistas norteamericanos gangsteriles, senala el documento y prosigue: 
					
					Ya desde la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado cuando se comenzaba la guerra fria, EE.UU. fijo a la recien fundada Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como blanco A segun el "plan de guerra A, B, C", trazado a puertas cerradas. Y provoco la guerra de agresion anti-RPDC con el fin de eliminarla en su cuna y extender sus tentaculos de agresion al continente chino y a los vastos territorios de la ex Union Sovietica, determinados como blancos B y C. 
					
					Esta ambicion de EE.UU. vagabundea hasta hoy en la Peninsula Coreana como fantasma de agresion y guerra, o sea, como la politica de hostilidad y las provocaciones belicas anti-RPDC y la formacion del cerco estrategico sobre el continente asiatico.
					
					Ahora pasa el limite el complot de EE.UU. de aislar y aplastar en lo politico a la RPDC. 
					
					Lejos de sacar la leccion en su derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, desatada el 25 de junio de 1950, el imperio norteamericano intensifica incesantemente el nivel de aislamiento, bloqueo y aplastamiento anti-RPDC con el designio de provocar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					Con respecto a que llegan a la etapa insoslayable las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC declara como lo siguiente:
					
					1. Anunciamos a todo el mundo que entra en una nueva etapa elevada la lucha antiyanqui de nuestro ejercito y pueblo por frustrar la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC de los imperialistas norteamericanos gangsteriles y sus maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento sin precedentes.
					
					La pasada guerra coreana revela a todo el mundo la barbaridad del imperialismo norteamericano y explota la colera arraigada de nuestro ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Los problematico es que EE.UU. se desespera por repetir la historia criminal del siglo pasado con la provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana, en lugar de pedir perdon por sus tremendos crimenes ya cometidos. 
					
					El imperio prepara la guerra nuclear y hasta la guerra bacteriologica moderna para exterminar a la nacion coreana.
					
					La nueva etapa de la lucha antiyanqui se extendera a la justa confrontacion dar el punto final a la historia de enfrentamiento RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					2. Aunque sea tarde, EE.UU. debe rendirse ante la historia y el pueblo coreano abandonando la politica hostil a la RPDC, nunca realizable con el paso de mucho tiempo. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo no son apatridas de ayer en que sufrian martirios nacionales por las fuerzas extranjeras por no tener armas. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia viendo claramente la realidad. 
					
					Le seria un proceder clarividente renunciar sin demora la politica hostil a la RPDC que es imposible de realizar aunque pase mucho tiempo. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, debe abandonar el plan de guerra de agresion y el alboroto de guerra nuclear en la tierra, el mar y el aire. 
					
					Aunque sea ahora, debe reflexionar con serenidad sobre la consecuencia de su politica hostil a la RPDC. 
					
					No debe despreciar nuestra advertencia de que estamos listos para la guerra convencional, la nuclear y la cibernetica.
					
					EE.UU. no tiene otro remedio mas que pedir perdon y rendirse ante el ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					3. Exhortamos al mundo a levantarse en el enfrentamiento antiyanqui mundial para desmembrar al bandidesco imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					EE.UU. es el caudillo de agresion y guerra y de provocacion y destruccion. 
					
					Ahora no se debe temer la fanfarroneria de EE.UU. ni unir las voces con sus injustas sofisterias gangsteriles ni incorporarse a sus actos de destruccion y perturbacion. 
					
					Todos los que desean de veras la paz del mundo y la estabilidad de la region deben salvar cuanto antes las masacres, los conflictos y las guerras que se comenten en nuestro planeta por las bestias yanquis. 
					
					Asia, Africa, el Medio Oriente y Europa deben cortar el brazo derecho, el izquierdo, el tobillo y el cuello de EE.UU.
					
					Todo el mundo debe unir las fuerzas para descuartizar a EE.UU., tigre de papel.
					
					Todas las personas que desean la paz duradera, el fomento del bienestar de la humanidad y la eterna seguridad de los descendientes deben levantarse en la lucha antiyanqui.
					
					La RPDC estara para siempre al frente de la lucha antiyanqui mundial para defender el mundo pacifico y la vida autentica de los seres humanos.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia instalacion de "Oficina de DDHH de ONU" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia instalacion de "Oficina de DDHH de ONU" en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC y el fuerte rechazo interno y externo, los compinches titeres surcoreanos instalaron por fin el pasado dia 23 en Seul la "oficina de DDHH del Norte de Corea" de la ONU, organo conspirador de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					Al respecto, las autoridades titeres y otros menganos y fulanos lo califican unanimemente como "jalon historico" y "asistencia y cooperacion necesarias". Tambien las fuerzas conservadoras incluyendo el "Partido Saenuri" tratan de aprovechar esta oportunidad para aprobar la "ley de DDHH del Norte" sometida a la consideracion de la "Asamblea Nacional".
					
					El imperio yanqui y otras fuerzas hostiles expresan la "bienvenida" a la instalacion y revelan abiertamente el intento de aplastar la RPDC.
					
					La declaracion fechada 24 del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria condena el presente complot como provocacion politica mas connotada contra la RPDC, y prosigue:
					
					El CRPP califica el alboroto de los compinches titeres para instalar ese organo intrigante bajo el control del imperio como desafio a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC y abierta declaracion de guerra para confrontarse hasta el final con ella, y lo condena en nombre de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					En ocasion del 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, aclaramos, a traves de la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, la posicion de principios y los remedios mas justos para salvar las relaciones intercoreanas en crisis seria y abrir la fase trascendental de la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Cuando todos los connacionales aplauden esa declaracion y desean con ansiedad la mejora de relaciones de ambas partes coreanas, la horda de Park Geun-hye orquesto a plena luz la presente conspiracion, lo cual constituye un crimen antinacional jamas intolerable que nego totalmente nuestra magnanimidad y sinceridad y pisoteo despiadadamente la esperanza de los connacionales.
					
					La "oficina de DDHH del Norte de Corea" de la ONU es un organo conspirador inventado por el imperio y las fuerzas seguidoras, atemorizados ante el poderio invencible del cada dias mas prospero socialismo a estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares, abusando del nombre de la ONU con los datos falsos de un punado de las escorias humanas para aislar y aplastar la RPDC.
					
					Por eso, diversos estratos surcoreanos la rechazaron como "organo conspirador anti-Norte con el casco de la ONU" y "enganoso organo intervencionista en asuntos ajenos con la mascara de derechos humanos" y se opusieron fuertemente a la instalacion de la "oficina" que incita la confrontacion de regimenes, destruye las relaciones intercoreanas y llama la guerra.
					
					Muchos paises del mundo y hasta los medios de prensa occidentales insistieron en que el "informe de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU, la "resolucion de DDHH del Norte" y la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" no tienen la autenticidad porque fueron fabricados con el extremado perjuicio y el malsano intento politico. Y vinieron rechazandolos tenazmente insistiendo en que esos no pueden ser documentos y organos de la ONU.
					
					Sin embargo, los compinches de Park instalaron por fin el organo conflictivo en Seul bajo la instigacion de su amo gringo y so pretexto de la "peticion de la ONU". Asi volvieron a poner al desnudo que ellos mismos son los maniacos conflictivos enloquecidos por el morboso veto y la hostilidad a su connacional.
					
					Se hizo mas oscura la perspectiva de las relaciones intercoreanas dado que se revelo mas claramente la intencion maligna de los compinches de Park de realizar a toda costa la ambicion de lograr la "unificacion mediante la absorcion de regimenes" sumandose a la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos.
					
					Ya advertimos severamente que desde cuando se ponga la placa en la puerta, esa "oficina" se convertira en el blanco de ataque despiadado.
					
					La ferrea voluntad de los uniformados y civiles coreanos es que ya no tenemos la necesidad de encontrarse por mas tiempo con quienes cometen solo la histerica furia conflictiva al llevar a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas y solamente se queda la liquidacion final.
					
					Desde este momento, los compinches titeres se responsabilizaran totalmente de las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen de las relaciones intercoreanas.

articles.title: Acto de juramento de venganza de militares del EPC
articles.content:
Acto de juramento de venganza de militares del EPC
Sinchon, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el distrito de Sinchon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur el acto de juramento de venganza de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea para denunciar los crimenes de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los enemigos clasistas cometidos durante la pasada guerra coreana y jurar vengarse mil veces de los enemigos.
					A la ocasion asistieron los funcionarios del MINFAP, los militares de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y los estudiantes de las escuelas revolucionarias.
					
					Ju Sang Won, director honorario del Museo de Sinchon, quien se salvo por los pelos en el deposito de polvora de Pamnamugol, revelo las atrocidades perpetradas por los agresores norteamericanos y los enemigos clasistas.
					
					Destaco que los vengadores de Sinchon esperan hoy tambien el momento de vengarse de los imperialismo yanqui y encomendo a los militares quemar el nido de los canibales norteamericanos para que no se repita la tragedia de Sinchon.
					
					Un Oficial, suboficial, soldado, alumno de la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung y otros intervencionistas enfatizaron que cobraran el precio de sangre de Sinchon al exterminar al imperialismo yanqui, enemigo jurado, y sus lacayos.
					
					En la narracion poetica "Estamos en visperas de la batalla de venganza final", los suboficiales insistieron en que con las fuerzas armadas del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu,  eliminaran el territorio de EE.UU., nido de los males.
					
					Fue recitada la poesia de juramento de venganza.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes recorrieron el Museo de Sinchon.
